achievements.title: Certified Hyperledger Fabric Developer
achievements.description: This course by Kerala Blockchain Academy covers Hyperledger Fabric (v2.3) architecture, Chaincode development, and Fabric Node SDK, culminating in a mini project.

achievements.title: Ethereum Fundamentals
achievements.description: This free course introduces Ethereum dApp development, covering smart contracts, Solidity, and blockchain fundamentals.

achievements.title: Certified Blockchain Associate
achievements.description: The Certified Blockchain Associate (CBA) by Kerala Blockchain Academy, in collaboration with MLG Blockchain, Canada, is a beginner-friendly course covering blockchain fundamentals and serving as a prerequisite for advanced developer programs

achievements.title: Blockchain Foundation Program
achievements.description: The Blockchain Foundation Program provides a comprehensive introduction to blockchain technology, covering decentralization, peer-to-peer networking, smart contracts, and industry applications.
